info.description:
# Gripper

Download all repositories from a GitHub organization via the CLI.

## Installation

## Pip

```shell script
pip install gripper
```

## Homebrew

```shell script
brew tap dkanejs/gripper
brew install gripper
```

## Usage
```shell script
$ gripper --help
Usage: gripper [OPTIONS]

  Download all repositories from a GitHub organisation.

Options:
  -t, --token TEXT                GitHub token (required if fetching private repos).
  -o, --organization TEXT         GitHub organization name.  [required]
  -d, --download-dir PATH         Download directory.  [required]
  -a, --archive-format [zip|tar]  Archive download format.  [required]
  --timeout INTEGER               Timeout (seconds).  [default: 30]
  --help                          Show this message and exit.
```
## Examples
### Short example
```shell script
gripper -t <your api token> -o pypy -a zip -d /tmp
```

### Long example
```shell script
gripper --token <your api token> --organization pypy --archive-format zip --download-dir /tmp
```

### Environment variable example:

```shell script
export GITHUB_TOKEN=<your api token>
export GITHUB_ORGANIZATION=pypy
export GITHUB_DOWNLOAD_DIR=/tmp
export GITHUB_ARCHIVE_FORMAT=zip
gripper
```
